abstract: Ever since Rupert Murdoch pulled off his $5 billion deal to buy Dow Jones & Company, industry observers have delighted in speculating whether The New York Times Company might be next.
lead_paragraph: Ever since Rupert Murdoch pulled off his $5 billion deal to buy Dow Jones & Company, industry observers have delighted in speculating whether The New York Times Company might be next.

headline.main: Investors Mull a Hypothetical Times Buyout
